name: 0x802
description:
Year 0x802, your spaceship is out of battery and have landed on a foreign planet.
Find some way to recharge your ship and continue your journey. 

Explore the world on your Hoverboard. 

This is the 3rd "game-a-month" of 2021. It's been done in 1 month in my free time after work.

Thanks to the amazing help of:

Marc D'Amico (VFX)
Mathieu Martinet (Modelling)
Julien Rochefort-Delsalle (Skinning, Rigging)
Walter Homs (Music)

Controls : 

WASD / Left Joystick  - Move
